Library.aiDescription: Utilize the AI Writing Assistant to effortlessly generate and enhance written content. Upload your documents or select from existing files to train the AI model, customize literary styles, and create text with tailored creativity and tone.

Hero.subheading: Unlock the power of AI to enhance your reading experience. Upload, organize, and discover your collection like never before.
Hero.disclaimer2: and we will never send more than one email per month.

writingAssistant.title: Personalized AI Writing Assistant
writingAssistant.description: Generate summaries, enhance your writing, and create high-quality content tailored to your style preferences.

retrievalAugmented.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
retrievalAugmented.description: Combine AI-generated content with your uploaded files for accurate and context-aware responses.

documentOrganization.title: Smart Document Organization
documentOrganization.description: Effortlessly categorize and search your documents for quick access and better management.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Accessibility
crossPlatform.description: Enjoy a seamless experience across web and mobile applications.

documentTraining.title: Document Training System
documentTraining.description: Upload documents to train the AI model, refining its ability to assist you with your unique writing style.

privacySecurity.title: Enhanced Privacy and Security
privacySecurity.description: Your data is securely stored and never shared with third parties.

whatIsMaktabati.question: What is Maktabati?
whatIsMaktabati.answer: Maktabati is an AI-powered platform designed to enhance your document organization and reading experience.

howAiWorks.question: How does the AI Writing Assistant work?
howAiWorks.answer: Our AI Writing Assistant analyzes your documents and provides summaries, writing enhancements, and more.

uploadFormats.question: Can I upload books in any format?
uploadFormats.answer: Yes, Maktabati supports various formats including PDF, EPUB, and DOCX.

dataPrivacy.question: Is my data safe and private?
dataPrivacy.answer: Yes, your data is securely stored and never shared with third parties.

customizeWriting.question: Can I customize the writing style of the AI?
customizeWriting.answer: Absolutely! Maktabati adapts to your writing style to generate personalized content.

isFree.question: Is Maktabati free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes, we offer free access with premium features available for advanced users.

CTA.title: Ready to level-up?
CTA.description: Unlock the power of AI to enhance your reading experience. Upload, organize, and discover your collection like never before.
